files.description: The files containing the architecture specification

projectName.default: The name of the project directory

logLevel.description: Set log level (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL)

noAnsi.description: Do not print ANSI control characters

skipHostnameCheck.description: Don't check the daemon's hostname against the name specified in the client certificate

projectDirectory.default: The path of the Compose file

compatibility.description: If set, Compose will attempt to convert deploy keys in v3 files to their non-Swarm equivalent

forceRecreate.description: Recreate containers even if their configuration and image haven't changed

noRecreate.description: If containers already exist, don't recreate them (incompatible with forceRecreate and renewAnonVolumes)

noBuild.description: Don't build an image, even if it's missing

noStart.description: Don't start the services after creating them

renewAnonVolumes.description: Recreate anonymous volumes instead of retrieving data from the previous containers

removeOrphans.description: Remove containers for services not defined in the Compose file

removeVolumes.description: Remove named volumes declared in the `volumes` section of the Compose file and anonymous volumes attached to containers

locationsCacheTTL.description: Available locations cache TTL (in seconds). When such cache expires, the connector performs a new request to check locations availability

resourcesCacheTTL.description: (**Deprecated.** Use locationsCacheTTL.) Available resources cache TTL (in seconds). When such cache expires, the connector performs a new request to check resources availability

timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for container shutdown when attached or when containers are already running

tlscacert.description: Trust certs signed only by this CA

tlsverify.description: Use TLS and verify the remote

transferBufferSize.description: Buffer size allocated for local and remote data transfers
